channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Expert Reveals Diddy Faces Very Long Prison Sentence Due To Hint From Judge
People Are Sharing The Under-Hyped Jobs That Are Actually Really, Really Great, And It Might Be Time For A Career Change
Texas flooding updates: Death toll rises to 24 in 'extraordinary catastrophe'
item.description: At least 24 people have died after heavy rain pounded Kerr County, Texas, early Friday, leading to "catastrophic" flooding, the sheriff said.

item.title: WATCH: Man in patriotic bathing suit chases runaway beach umbrella

item.title: Judge rejects request, paving way for removal of 8 migrants detained in Djibouti
item.description: A judge on Friday denied an eleventh-hour request to block the removal of eight migrants detained in Djibouti, paving the way for their removal to Sou...

item.title: Hamas issues "positive response" to latest Gaza ceasefire proposal
item.description: The Hamas terrorist group said Friday it has issued a "positive response" to a U.S.-mediated ceasefire proposal​ in its war with Israel.

item.title: Dozens dead in Texas after devastating floods slam Hill Country, officials say
item.description: "Between 23 and 25" campers are still believed to be missing from Camp Mystic, an all-girls camp, officials said Friday night.

item.title: Texas officials give update on death toll, rescue efforts amid flooding
item.description: Officials in central Texas say dozens of people are dead after major flooding hit the area. Gov. Greg Abbott and other officials held a news conferenc...

item.title: Britpop rockers Oasis reunite for first concert in 16 years
item.description: The feuding Gallagher brothers kicked off a reunion tour in Cardiff, Wales, their first performance since their acrimonious split in 2009.

item.title: Human remains found at California fireworks warehouse explosion site, officials say

item.title: WATCH: Amazon truck loses control and veers off road

item.title: Trump signs divisive spending bill during White House military picnic
item.description: President Donald Trump celebrated the Fourth of July by signing his massive spending bill that narrowly passed in Congress this week.

24 dead in Texas floods and more than 20 children missing from a girls summer camp
item.description: Heavy rains have caused devastating flash floods in Texas Hill Country, killing at least 24 people and leaving many others missing.
